Highlight Display, Auto Image Rotation, Image Comment (upto 36 Characters), Delete Function (Card Format, All Frames Delete, Selected Frames Delete, 1.5x Focal Length (Picture Angle (35 mm (135) Format Equivalent), Focusing Screen (Type B BriteView Clear Matte VI), Viewfinder Frame Coverage (5% Horizontal and 95% Vertical, 0.72x Maganificatin (50 mm Lens at Infinity, -1.0 m-1)), Autofocus (51 Focus Points by Nikon Multi-CAM 3500FX Autofocus Module, Detection Range: -1 to EV (ISO 100 at 20° C/68° F)), Focus Modes (Single-servo AF (AF-S), Continuous-servo AF, Manual Focus), Exposure Metering of Frame, Spot: Meters 4.0 mm Circle (about 1.5% Frame) Centered on Selected Focus Point (On Center Focus Area when Non-CPU Lens is Used), Exposure Control (Programmed Auto (P) with Flexible Program, Shutter Priority Auto (S), Aperture Priority Auto (A), Manual (M)), Auto Exposure Lock (Luminosity Locked at Detected Value with AE-L / AF-L Button), Auto Exposure Bracketing ( 5 in increments of 1/3, Shoe (Standard ISO 518 Hot-shoe Contact with Safety Lock), Depth of Field Preview Button, Remote Control (Via 10-pin Remote Cord MC-22/30/36 (Optional)), GPS (GPS: NMEA 0183 (Ver. 2.01 and 3.01) Interface Standard), Supported Languages (Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish), 1000 Warranty of the product is limited to only manufacturing defect on camera body & lens.
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Customer needs to carry the product to the nearby Authorized Service Center to get the product repaired or inspected.

Nikon Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Defects or malfunctions caused by damage resulting from improper care, misuse or abuse of this product or operation of this product contrary to the instructions contained in the owner's manual. Damage or defect caused by accident, sand, water or battery leakage. Damage caused during transportation or mail. Damaged caused by any modifications or servicing performed by person(s) other than NIKON AUTHORISED SERVICE FACILITY. Accessories including batteries, charger, AC adaptor and other consumables. Any electronic data loss due to malfunctioning or repair of this product. Any consequential or incidental damages resulting from any breach of warranty, express or implied, applicable to this product. Nikon India New Extended Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Accessories like batteries, charger, USB cable, AV cable, Adapters, strap, etc. are not covered under warranty. Damage caused due to accident, sand, water, dust, fungus, battery leakage, etc are not covered under warranty. Warranty on free gifts is as per the terms of their respective manufactures, and this warranty does not extend to such gifts. Warranty does not cover the replacement of Product. Warranty does not cover any special, consequential or incidental damages arising in way due to malfunction of the Product such as loss of photography, loss of data, use, profits, or costs and expenses, etc.

Low-temperature Polysilicon TFT LCD with Brightness Adjustment
the best camera ever made..better than D800

Awesome Camera!What i like about this camera:1. Focusing2. The look and feel of the photos (can't be explained)3. Co lours coming out of it!!!4. The FPS rate5. No, i'am not taking about the ISO6. great MP for user like me who just take photos for myself and upload it to my website.

Got a very good deal at Flipkart - 126k body plus 70-300 G lens.Terrific performance. Very low noise - goes to ISO 6400 with good results. Better to shoot RAW at high ISO and PP for noise reduction. Out of camera Jpegs are also very good.Good white balance.Its 12 Megapixel full frame sensor is exceptional.Nothing better than this for the serious amateur.Use with good quality lens (suggest Nikon only) for best results.CONS -Mirror slap is noisy (you get used to it after some time)Uses CF cards. - Suggest you buy 2 No's 8 or 16GB UDMA CF cards which should see you through most shoots.
